title: Conduct Preliminary Research and Analysis
description: Gather existing information about vertical wind turbines, their design principles, efficiency factors, and urban environment constraints.

title: Define Design Requirements and Specifications
description: Create a comprehensive list of design requirements and specifications for the vertical wind turbine considering factors like size, power output, efficiency, durability, aesthetics, safety, and noise level.

title: Develop Prototype Design Concepts
description: Generate multiple design concepts for the vertical wind turbine, considering factors like material selection, blade shape, rotor design, and structural integrity.

title: Perform Wind Tunnel Tests on Prototype Designs
description: Test the prototype designs in a wind tunnel to measure their performance, aerodynamic efficiency, stability, and resistance.

title: Refine Selected Design based on Wind Tunnel Test Results
description: Revise the selected design concept based on wind tunnel test results and make necessary adjustments to improve performance, aerodynamic efficiency, stability, and resistance.
dependencies: Perform Wind Tunnel Tests on Prototype Designs

title: Create Detailed Design and Engineering Drawings
description: Create detailed design and engineering drawings for the finalized vertical wind turbine design, including all necessary dimensions, materials, and assembly instructions.
dependencies: Refine Selected Design based on Wind Tunnel Test Results

title: Manufacture and Assemble Prototype
description: Manufacture the prototype using the detailed design and engineering drawings, then assemble it according to the instructions provided.
dependencies: Create Detailed Design and Engineering Drawings

title: Perform Functional Testing on Prototype
description: Thoroughly test the prototype for functional correctness, performance, and compliance with design requirements in urban environments. The tests should include checks for wind resistance, rotor efficiency, noise levels, and structural integrity.

title: Address Functional Testing Issues and Revise as Necessary
description: Resolve any functional testing issues found during testing, make necessary revisions to the design, and repeat testing until satisfactory results are achieved.

title: Prepare Production Plan and Cost Estimate
description: Create a production plan and cost estimate for manufacturing the vertical wind turbine, considering factors like quantity, materials, labor costs, and any additional resources required.
dependencies: Address Functional Testing Issues and Revise as Necessary
